author: James B
title: Good hotel more potential though
text: Stayed here with my girlfriend for 4 nights and was worried by some previous reviews, however this was largely unfounded. The location of the hotel is excellent and the staff were generally helpful. The hotel has a long way to go to truly be 4 star though. The shower head in my room was coming away from the wall and the hotel rooms look very dated and tired and in dire need of some tlc. Other than that it is still a good hotel and location.
